recipes.title: Cheesy and Creamy Chicken Tetrazzini
recipes.desc: Delicious and creamy ! This recipe is my brother's favorite of everythin that I cook, and the first one I mastered.

recipes.title: Chicken and Pineapple

recipes.title: Beef Ball
recipes.desc: Break out the beef ball and get the party rolling! Dried chipped beef and cheese are rolled into a tantalizing treat that's great with buttery, round crackers, vegetables and tortilla chips.
recipes.author: John Doe
